name: GLENBROOK LEASING COMPANY, Appellant v. Michael F. BEAUSANG, Jr., Esquire and Butera, Beausang, Cohen & Brennan, Appellees

judges: Before: CAPPY, C.J., CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN, SAYLOR, EAKIN and BAER, JJ.
parties: GLENBROOK LEASING COMPANY, Appellant v. Michael F. BEAUSANG, Jr., Esquire and Butera, Beausang, Cohen & Brennan, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The Order of the Superior Court is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Kevin William Gibson, Media, for Glenbrook Leasing Co., appellant.
Ronald Frederick Brien, Jr., Spring City, Jerome E. Bogutz, James W. Christie, III, Philadelphia, for Michael F. Beausang, Jr., Esquire and Butera, Beausang, Cohen & Brennan, appellees.
Amy Joann Coco, Pittsburgh, Jeffrey B. Albert, Philadelphia, Dennis John Roman, Pittsburgh, for PA Bar Ass’n, appellee amicus curiae.
Louis C. Long, Pittsburgh, for PA Defense Institute, appellee amicus curiae.

881 A.2d 1266
